Publication Title: A human vascularized microtumor model of patient-derived colorectal cancer recapitulates clinical disease
Publication Authors: Stephanie J Hachey, Agua Sobrino, John G Lee, Mehraneh D Jafari, Samuel J Klempner, Eric J Puttock, Robert A Edwards, John S Lowengrub, Marian L Waterman, Jason A Zell, Christopher C W Hughes
Publication Abstract: Accurately modeling tumor biology and testing novel therapies on patient-derived cells is critically important to developing therapeutic regimens personalized to a patient's specific disease. Publication Assay: Cell Culture, Viral Transduction, Flow Cytometry, Fluorescence Lifetime Imaging Microscopy, Microfluidics

Publication Title: Phase field modeling and computation of vesicle growth or shrinkage
Publication Keywords: Osmosis, Convergence, Cahn–hilliard Equation, Allen–Cahn Equation, Nonlinear Multigrid, Vesicle Growth Or Shrinkage
Publication Authors: Xiaoxia Tang, Shuwang Li, John S Lowengrub, Steven M Wise
Publication Abstract: We present a phase field model for vesicle growth or shrinkage induced by an osmotic pressure due to a chemical potential gradient. The model consists of an Allen-Cahn equation describing the evolution of the phase field parameter that describes the shape of the vesicle and a Cahn-Hilliard-type equation describing the evolution of the ionic fluid.
